x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts.name: Variables of Catalog

sys_update_version.name: x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts_34582467072739105295f19d7c1ed0bc
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts"><x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Variables of Catalog</name><number>SCRIPT0001067</number><script><![CDATA[var current=new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
current.get("fc0b90cb07cd35105295f19d7c1ed081");
var vs = new GlobalServiceCatalogUtil().getVariablesForTask(current, true);		
	for (var i=0; i < vs.length; i++) 
	{
		var isMRVS=lbl=vs[i].multi_row+"";
		var lbl=vs[i].label+"";
		var dis=vs[i].display_value+"";
		var visible=vs[i].visible_summary+"";
		var msg="";
		if(isMRVS=='true')
		{
			var vArr=vs[i];
			msg+= lbl +"\n";
			for (var j=0; j < vArr.table_variable.length; j++) 
			{
				msg+= "Row: " + (j+1)  + "\n"; 
				var tblArr=vArr.table_variable[j];
				for (var k=0; k < tblArr.length; k++) 
				{
					var mrvslbl=tblArr[k].label+"";
					var mrvsdis=tblArr[k].display_value+"";
					if(mrvslbl != '' && mrvsdis!='' && mrvsdis!='false') 
					{
						msg+="\t"+ mrvslbl +  ": " + mrvsdis + "\n"; 
					}
				}
				msg+="\n";
			}
		}
		else
		{
			if (lbl != '' && dis!='' && dis!='false' && visible=='true') {
				msg+= lbl + ": " + dis + "\n"; 
			}
		}

	}
	gs.info(msg);]]></script><sys_class_name>x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-11 07:51:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>34582467072739105295f19d7c1ed0bc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Variables of Catalog</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Technical Repo" source="x_207260_technic_0">6362d051072ff5d05295f19d7c1ed08f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Technical Repo">6362d051072ff5d05295f19d7c1ed08f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts_34582467072739105295f19d7c1ed0bc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-11 07:51:12</sys_updated_on></x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts></record_update>
